Changes
=======

Version 0.5.7
-------------

* Django 1.3 compatibility

Version 0.5.6
-------------

* Fix typo ($ instead of &) in restart_script reload mode.

Version 0.5.5
-------------

* Fixed translation when label was in two or more catalog. A priority 
calculation mismatch.

Version 0.5.4
-------------

* Fixed some spanish translations.
